## Steps to reproduce

```
Invoke-RestMethod "http://api.zergpool.com/api/status"
```
(same problem happens with `Invoke-WebRequest "http://api.zergpool.com/api/status" -UseBasicParsing`)

## Expected behavior

The functions should follow the 302 redirect to `http://api.zergpool.com:8080/api/status` and return a collection of objects. This works perfect with Powershell 5 and Powershell 6

## Actual behavior

Instead, the command throws an Exception with the following error:

```
302 Found
Found
The document has moved here.
```

I already have tried to set `-MaximumRedirection 5`, just in case, but no change.

```

```
title: [Pwsh7] Invoke-RestMethod/Invoke-WebRequest don't follow 302 redirects
